access: If you stay with us you can be as self-contained as you choose to be. You have a separate entrance via the back of the house, or enter via our front door.
additional_house_rules:
- Be kind and respectful within our family home. We have children and live in a respectable neighborhood. 
-turn off lights when not in use
-no visitors
-no parties
-no smoking outside or inside our property.
description:
My place is close to La Guardia/JFK Airport, Flushing Meadows, Mets, U.S Open Tennis. 45min into Midtown Manhattan by MTA- $2.75 trip or 20 mins by car. We are 30 minutes drive to the beautiful beaches of Long Island . Car rental nearby and free parking available. 
My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

Our place is quiet, relaxing and modern, clean and a home from home. We have furnished everything from IKEA.Enjoy Netflix, listen to music and unwind before your flight or day out in Manhattan.

If you stay with us you can be as self-contained as you choose to be. You have a separate entrance via the back of the house, or enter via our front door.

Our door is open and we welcome questions about how to get somewhere or where to go for dinner. Transportation links are great to many areas of interest or if an outdoor run/bike is more your thing we know the best routes!

East Elmhurst is very diverse family friendly community. We live a couple of blocks away from local school with play area, baseball field and basketball courts. We are an 8 min easy walk to La Guardia Airport Terminal D and the beautiful North Shore/ Flushing Meadows area which makes for some great walk/run/bike rides. Citifield is very close by as is the U.S Open. Much of NYC attractions are here such as The World's Fair Unisphere, The Queens Museum, The New York Hall of Science and Queens Zoo. The local Buccaneer Diner boasts table jukebox's and we have various take out restaurants from Columbian food to pizza!  Definitely upload your Yelp App as you will not need Manhattan for restaurants!A short 10 minute Uber/ taxi/bus ride will take you to the best Greek, Italian, Korean, Japanese, Indian , Mexican restaurants - Queens is the most diverse borough of NYC!

We are a walk to the airport and a bus ride to the Subway. Manhattan door to door typically take 50min to Midtown. We mainly use the SBS 70 from La Guardia to 74st/Broadway/Jackson Hts/ Roosevelt Avenue to pick up the E, F express train  and also 7 train( peak hours). We otherwise use Q19 bus to Astoria Blvd to pick up N and Q. You can also take the SBS from La Guardia all the way to 125th Street via the RFK bridge. We are right on the Grand Central Parkway, to Van Wyk Expressway to JFK airport.

For traveller's staying longer than 6 days we will need access to the living room/ bathroom to clean and to do our laundry Mondays and Thursday mornings

hosts.about:
Hello! I am Caroline. I'm British woman, living in Queens, N.Y with my husband and our 2 kids where we work as actors . I am also a children's author ( I am Me...You, Us and We)and Reiki Master. car(URL HIDDEN) (URL HIDDEN)
 I like to run,  I'm vegetarian( the rest of the family still need convincing!) I like astrology(shh!)and I like a challenge to push my boundaries- hence why we moved here from UK 4 years ago! Travel plays a big part in our lives- we have family in Sweden, Germany, Spain and South Africa as well as the U.K- hence why we love being close to airports! We love watching Modern Family with the kids, going on epic bike rides and being in Manhattan on the weekends- our son is an expert on the MTA! My daughter loves dancing and books. I love all things that I can't buy here like Fry's Turkish Delight, bombay mix and  Yorkshire Tea- which I drink like its going out of fashion in a teapot as it supposed to be served-just sayin'! My husband loves classic cars and cooking meat on a braii ie grilling! We love living here and have hosted many friends/ acquaintances in our previous apartment over the last 4 years. Now we want to bring new friends from the rest of the world into our home which is light, airy fresh and modern.You have a separate entrance to the basement so you will not disturb us! We are going about our lives upstairs until which is always varied- maybe working in T.V/theatre/ putting down voice overs whilst running our kids to/from school, but our house is calm and quiet and very welcoming! We can be around for advice on how to get wherever- trust me we KNOW this city- or will hang back and watch you come and go- whichever suits your personality- as long as we communicate kindness and respect we will get along famously! Our basement is one bedroom (full sized bed +large wardrobe) with living room/kitchenette furnished with ikea chaise sofa-bed, Roku/Apple TV, wi-fi, microwave and laundry. When we first visited NYC on holiday we rented apartments so we know what worked and what didn't. You can rest, relax and unwind knowing that upstairs live decent, creative, kind and considerate people who love life and welcome you being here! Namaste!

house_rules:
• Check in time is 3PM - 10PM
• No parties or events
• Not suitable for pets
• No smoking

- Be kind and respectful within our family home. We have children and live in a respectable neighborhood. 
-turn off lights when not in use
-no visitors
-no parties
-no smoking outside or inside our property.

We are an 8 min easy walk to La Guardia Airport Terminal D and the beautiful North Shore/ Flushing Meadows area which makes for some great walk/run/bike rides. Citifield is very close by as is the U.S Open. Much of NYC attractions are here such as The World's Fair Unisphere, The Queens Museum, The New York Hall of Science and Queens Zoo. The local Buccaneer Diner boasts table jukebox's and we have various take out restaurants from Columbian food to pizza!  Definitely upload your Yelp App as you will not need Manhattan for restaurants!A short 10 minute Uber/ taxi/bus ride will take you to the best Greek, Italian, Korean, Japanese, Indian , Mexican restaurants - Queens is the most diverse borough of NYC!

photos.caption: Full double bed, large wardrobe and desk in bedroom
Modern decor with brand new furnishings.
Laundry/kitchenette with toaster, kettle, microwave and mini-fridge.
Own separate entrance to basement via the rear of our house
Direct access outside entrance with bistro table/chairs
North Shore Marina is a pleasant walk
Citifield-  Home of the Mets baseball team is an easy mile walk along the North Shore Bay
La Guardia airport is an 8 min walk away.
Map of Flushing Meadows- great for families and sporty/active guests
Midtown Manhattan is an easy 20min drive off peak.
Manhattan is easy 20mins off peak by car and 45 min using M.T.A(Subway)-$2.75
Beautiful Marina- perfect views on bike/run
